credit_line: Gift of Philadelphia Museum of Art
title: Bachelor's Wall Paper
description: The faces of Charles Dana Gibson's unmistakable "Gibson Girls". a) The faces are printed in black with light blue patches of color for the hair, on an off-white ground. "a" is machine printed; b) a 1969 Birge reproduction of the original. Same design as "a" but reversed and slightly larger scale. The faces are printed in black over a possibly 3 color floral (?) ground.  The background has the appearance of camouflage. "b" is screen printed.
name: Sidewall
